subject: Hockey, Ice
Fines (Penalties)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. cited Buffalo forward Patrick Kaleta’s repeat offender status in handing down the punishment for his face-slamming hit on the Rangers’ Brad Richards.
snippet: The N.H.L. cited Buffalo forward Patrick Kaleta’s repeat offender status in handing down the punishment for his face-slamming hit on the Rangers’ Brad Richards.
